text_block_list.text: Next week, finally, there's going to be a Selection Race…! As a brand new trainer, it'll be the first time I've seen one
Selection Races are a place for Uma Musume to demonstrate their abilities, and for trainers to scout them. It's really important for both sides.
There were still a few days left, but I was so nervous and excited that I couldn't keep calm… to distract myself from these feelings, I decided to go for a walk.
While I was passing by a park near the academy, I could hear the sounds of children playing. When I looked in that direction-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Alright, time's up! None of ya were able ta keep up!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: T-Tama-neechan, you're super fast~!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Even with all of us chasing you, we still couldn't catch you~ Go easier on us~!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Daa haa haa! The world of competition is harsh, ya hear? Just cuz yer kids, don't go thinkin' I'll go easy on ya.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Tama-oneechan! I wanna see what it's like when Tama-oneechan is serious!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Me too, me too! Just like 'zoom'! I wanna see it again!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Whaddaya mean, again!? Geez, guess I don' really have a choice, just a lil' bit, got it? C'mon, step back some! Y'all could get hurt!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ok, here I go~! Just a bit, ya hear? Better keep those eyes peeled, else yer gonna miss it!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Fuuu-!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Uoooooooooooo!! My runnin'!! Howzzat?!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Awwwwesome!~! She's so faaaast~!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Tama-oneechan, so cool-!!
Truthfully, her running was very powerful, despite how cheerful she looked… but what drew my attention the most, was that overwhelming explosive power. Almost like-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: - Whadija say? Wait, who the heck are you?!
Maybe it was because I was too excited seeing her run, but I spoke without thinking! Everyone in the area turned their attention to me.
choice_data_list: I-I'm definitely not a suspicious person…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ain't nobody who says that that ain't suspicious! Wait, yer eyes are sparklin'… you brats, make sure ya stay behind me!
Looks like she's mistaking me for some kind of creeper…! In a panic, I explain myself to her.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -In short, while takin' a walk, ya got distracted by an Uma Musume. Haa~ guess yer the type that's crazy 'bout yer job.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Anyhow, whatta coincidence. Yer a newbie trainer, right? Me too, I'm an Uma Musume that ain't debuted just yet.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: -Tama-neechan! Let's play hide-and-seek next!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yeah, hold your horses! I'll be over in a sec- …fuu, those brats've got more energy than they know wha' ta do with.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Name's Tamamo Cross. Must be some kinda fate, huh? As rookies, you and me gotta do our best! Later!
When she debuts, I wonder what kind of run she'll show us? While thinking that, I left the place feeling refreshed.
And then, one week later.
Finally, the day of the Selection Race had come. When I looked over at the participating Uma Musume-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: 'sall good… I can win… Just hafta get out front… get out front, and get first…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -Gotta win. At a place like this… gotta make sure ta win…!
Tamamo Cross seemed a little different from when I first met her, and it bothered me a little bit, but the the race was about to begin-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haaa… haaa… haaa…!! Gonna win…! For sure, gotta win…!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross, is this where she runs out of steam?! She's slowly falling out of the leading group! She's unable to keep up!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ku…!!
In the end, Tamamo Cross ended up not finishing in the top 5. To me, something seemed off about her run… like she didn't have any leeway at all.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross, was it? At the start she showed admirable determination, but she hurried too much and failed to properly manage her pace…

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Her battle spirit isn't a bad thing. But with that small body, competing with others at the end of the race might be too much.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Damn …… damn, damn, damn ……! What the fuck are you doing, we're ……!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer B
text_block_list.text: -Tamamo Cross. I apologize for disturbing you while you're still tired from your race, but could I have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh?… w-what…?

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer B
text_block_list.text: I'll keep it short. I want to scout you. It's still a bit unrefined, but your run wasn't bad.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: F-fer real?!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Yeah. If you join my team, you could eventually work your way up to a Major race. If everything goes well, you might even be competitive. How does that sound?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: … [might even be competitive] is it? By that, ya mean I might even have a chance at winnin' a G1?

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer B
text_block_list.text: That is… something I can't guarantee. It all depends on you, it's just a possibility-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: - Don' mess with me!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I wanna win! Win and win and win like hell! Not winnin' ain't gonna fly!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Just "might be competitive" ya say?! There's a limit ta how much ya can treat someone like a fool! I'm- not doin' this with such a half-hearted feelin'!!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer B
text_block_list.text: …looks like her temperment is a bit too much for me.
After Tamamo Cross ran off, nobody chased after her. But for me, her intense drive for victory was deeply striking.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: God damnit… god damnit… really, unforgiveable…! Bein' underestimated… and my own half-assed runnin'…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: nn?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yer, if I remember… from tha' time at th' park…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …Yer, a rookie trainer ain't ya? Ya got no experience or even results to yer name, how 'bout resolve?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Believin' in my victory, trainin' me, and winnin' G1s! The resolve ta be th' best in Japan! Do ya really have tha' kinda resolve?!
There was an intense amount of spirit behind those words. Unconsciously, I was taken aback at that pressure, unable to speak.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …forget it. Both of us, we're done here-
…After she left, the only thing I could think of was, how I regretted not being able to even respond to her words at all…
